workflow.name: Track Singapore COE prices with AI forecasting & smart buy recommendations via Telegram
workflow.description:
## Introduction
Automates Singapore COE price tracking with AI forecasts and buy/wait recommendations. Weekly scraping collects LTA data, enriches with economic indicators, predicts 6-month trends, and alerts users via Telegram/email‚Äîhelping car buyers and fleet managers make data-driven purchase decisions while avoiding manual tracking.

## How it Works
Weekly trigger scrapes LTA COE ‚Üí validates ‚Üí stores in Google Sheets ‚Üí calculates indicators ‚Üí AI forecasts trends ‚Üí multi-scenario analysis ‚Üí generates buy/wait signals ‚Üí sends actionable alerts.

## Setup Steps
1. Add OpenAI/NVIDIA API credentials in n8n
2. Authenticate Google Sheets and create spreadsheet
3. Configure Telegram bot or Gmail SMTP
4. Set weekly trigger (Thursday 9AM SGT post-bidding)
5. Adjust alert thresholds in conditional nodes

## Workflow
Schedule Trigger ‚Üí Scrape COE ‚Üí Validate ‚Üí Store Sheets ‚Üí Fetch Historical ‚Üí Calculate Indicators ‚Üí AI Prediction ‚Üí Merge Economics ‚Üí Multi-Scenario Analysis ‚Üí Compare Conditions ‚Üí Generate Dashboard ‚Üí Send Alerts

## Workflow Steps
1. Scraping: Fetch LTA COE results with retry logic
2. Validation: Check completeness, flag anomalies
3. Storage: Append timestamped records to Sheets
4. Enrichment: Calculate moving averages, volatility, seasonality
5. AI Analysis: Forecast next 6 months with confidence intervals
6. Decision Engine: Output buy/wait/monitor recommendation
7. Reporting: Create dashboard and send alerts via Telegram/email

## Prerequisites
OpenAI/NVIDIA API key, Google Sheets access, Telegram bot token or Gmail, basic COE category understanding

## Use Cases
First-time buyers timing purchases, fleet operators coordinating bulk acquisitions

## Customization
Add SMS alerts via Twilio, integrate loan calculators for total cost analysis

## Benefits
Saves 5+ hours monthly, captures 10‚Äì18% price dips, provides predictive insights (potential $10K‚Äì$25K savings)

workflow.name: AI-GROK-4 COE Price Tracker with Smart Buy/Wait Recommendations

assignments.name: predictionPrompt

parameters.text:
=üö® *COE BUY ALERT* üö®

Optimal buying opportunity detected!

{{ Object.entries($json.recommendations)
  .filter(([_, rec]) => rec.action === 'BUY NOW')
  .map(([cat, rec]) => `*${cat}*: $${rec.currentPrice.toLocaleString('en-SG')}\nScore: ${rec.score}/100\n${rec.timingAdvice}`)
  .join('\n\n') }}

View full report in your email.

assignments.name: dashboardSummary
enhancedPrompt

parameters.text:
=üö® *URGENT: Significant COE Price Movement Detected* üö®

{{ Object.entries($json.recommendations)
  .filter(([_, rec]) => Math.abs(rec.rateOfChange || 0) > 10)
  .map(([cat, rec]) => `*${cat}*: ${rec.rateOfChange > 0 ? 'üìà' : 'üìâ'} ${Math.abs(rec.rateOfChange).toFixed(1)}% change\nCurrent: $${rec.currentPrice.toLocaleString('en-SG')}\nAction: ${rec.action}`)
  .join('\n\n') }}

Immediate review recommended.

parameters.content:
## Introduction
Automates Singapore COE price tracking with AI forecasts and buy/wait recommendations. Weekly scraping collects LTA data, enriches with economic indicators, predicts 6-month trends, and alerts users via Telegram/email‚Äîhelping car buyers and fleet managers make data-driven purchase decisions while avoiding manual tracking.

## How it Works
Weekly trigger scrapes LTA COE ‚Üí validates ‚Üí stores in Google Sheets ‚Üí calculates indicators ‚Üí AI forecasts trends ‚Üí multi-scenario analysis ‚Üí generates buy/wait signals ‚Üí sends actionable alerts.

## Setup Steps
1. Add OpenAI/NVIDIA API credentials in n8n
2. Authenticate Google Sheets and create spreadsheet
3. Configure Telegram bot or Gmail SMTP
4. Set weekly trigger (Thursday 9AM SGT post-bidding)
5. Adjust alert thresholds in conditional nodes

## Prerequisites
OpenAI/NVIDIA API key, Google Sheets access, Telegram bot token or Gmail, basic COE category understanding

## Use Cases
First-time buyers timing purchases, fleet operators coordinating bulk acquisitions

## Customization
Add SMS alerts via Twilio, integrate loan calculators for total cost analysis

## Benefits
Saves 5+ hours monthly, captures 10‚Äì18% price dips, provides predictive insights (potential $10K‚Äì$25K savings)

## Weekly COE Check Trigger














Launches workflow every Thursday 9AM SGT, right after LTA bidding closes
Why: Captures price data at the moment it matters most‚Äîfresh results mean your forecast starts with the latest market signal before prices shift

## Scrape LTA COE Data




























Fetches official COE results with retry logic to handle connection issues
Why: LTA is the authoritative source; automated scraping eliminates manual checking while retry logic ensures you never miss a bidding round due to network hiccups

## Validate Data Completeness
Checks that all COE categories arrived and flags any anomalies or missing records
Why: Bad data breaks forecasts‚Äîcatching incomplete records here prevents misleading buy/wait signals downstream

## Store Data
Appends timestamped COE records to your spreadsheet with category breakdown
Why: Creates permanent audit trail; you can always trace back why a recommendation was made, and historical data feeds better AI predictions over time

## Fetch Historical Baseline
Retrieves previous 12+ months of COE data to establish trends
Why: AI needs context‚Äîknowing if prices are historically high or low makes 6-month forecasts meaningful, not just noise

## Market Indicators & AI Forecasting- Processing

Builds key indicators (averages, volatility, seasonality, trends) and uses them to predict COE prices 6 months out.
**Why:** Converts raw data into fast, clear signals and forecasts so users can judge market direction and decide if waiting helps or hurts.

## Merge Economic Indicators
Enriches COE data with interest rates, vehicle import taxes, fuel costs, and market sentiment
Why: COE doesn't exist in a vacuum‚Äîeconomic context explains why prices move; better forecasts come from understanding the full picture

## Multi-Scenario Analysis

Generates three outcomes: best case (wait scenario), base case (realistic), worst case (buy now)
Why: Removes false certainty‚Äîyou see the range of possibilities and can decide your own risk tolerance instead of following one rigid signal

## Threshold Comparison & COE Dashboard

Checks forecasts against your custom buy/wait rules, then compiles prices, predictions, recommendations, and confidence levels into a single dashboard.
**Why:** Supports different decision styles‚Äîwhether it‚Äôs ‚Äúbuy if >15% savings expected‚Äù or ‚Äúwait if volatility <8%‚Äù‚Äîand gives stakeholders one clear view without digging through spreadsheets.

## Send Telegram/Email Alerts
Delivers your recommendation, key price changes, and next review date via your preferred channel
Why: Information reaches you where you check it‚Äîwhether you're a solo buyer or coordinating fleet-wide purchases, you stay informed without manual monitoring

user.name: Cheng Siong Chin
user.bio: Dr. Cheng Siong CHIN is an n8n workflow creator specializing in AI-powered automation, agent orchestration, and intelligent system integrations. He designs and builds end-to-end workflows that combine LLMs, APIs, and data pipelines to streamline complex processes and deliver production-ready automation solutions. Contact me to discuss custom AI workflows and agent architectures.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
